TeamEnforcer.CannotJoinCt: You cannot join the CT team directly, use {0} to join the queue.
TeamEnforcer.CannotLeaveCt: You cannot leave the CT team directly, use {0} to get moved at the end of the round.
TeamEnforcer.AlreadyInQueue: You are already in the queue. Position: {green}#{0}{default} In: {blue}{1}{default}.
TeamEnforcer.NotInQueue: You are not in the queue.
TeamEnforcer.RemovedFromQueue: You were removed from the queue.
TeamEnforcer.MustBeT: You need to be a Terrorist to use this command.
TeamEnforcer.MustBeCT: You need to be a CT to use this command.
TeamEnforcer.AddedToPriorityQueue: You have been added to the priority queue.
TeamEnforcer.RandomTPromoted: {blue}{0}{default} was chosen at random to be moved to CT.
TeamEnforcer.TPromotedFromQueue: {blue}{0}{default} was chosen from the queue to be moved to CT.
TeamEnforcer.NotEnoughTsAvailable: Unable to find enough Ts to join CT. Team balance is off.
TeamEnforcer.PlayerDemotedJoinedIllegiti: {blue}{0}{default} was removed from CT because they did not join through legit means.
TeamEnforcer.PlayerDemotedFromStack: There are too many CTs, {blue}{0}{default} was the latest CT to join so they were chosen to be removed back to T.
TeamEnforcer.DemotedFromLeaversList: You were removed from CT because you used the {0} command.
TeamEnforcer.CannotJoinQueueFromNotT: You must be in the Terrorist team to join the guard queue.
TeamEnforcer.CtTeamEmptyInstantlyMoved: The CT team is empty so you were moved instantly.
TeamEnforcer.AddedToLeaveList: You were added to the list of leavers, you will be moved next round.
TeamEnforcer.AddedToNoCTList: You were added to the no-CT list. You will not be chosen randomly to join CT.
TeamEnforcer.AlreadyInNoCTList: You are already in the no-CT list. You will not be chosen randomly to join CT.
TeamEnforcer.QueueEmpty: The queue is currently empty, use the {0} command to join it.
TeamEnforcer.AlreadyInLeaveList: You are already in the leavers list, you will be moved next round.
TeamEnforcer.AddedToMapCtList: You were added to this map's CT list, you will have a lower priority when joining the CT team next map.
TeamEnforcer.AddedToLowPriorityQueue: You were added to the Low Priority queue. You were a CT in the last map.
TeamEnforcer.CTBanUnavailable: CTBan features are unavailable. Notify server administrator.
TeamEnforcer.CTBannedTempMessage: You are currently CTBanned and cannot join the CT team. Your CTBan expires in {green}{0} minutes{default}.
TeamEnforcer.CTBannedPermMessage: You are {red}permanently{default} banned from joining the CT team.
TeamEnforcer.RemovedCtBanned: You were removed from the CT team because you are CTBanned.
TeamEnforcer.NotCTBanned: {blue}{0}{default} does not have an active CTBan.
TeamEnforcer.PlayerForcedToCT: {blue}{0}{default} was forced into the CT team by {gold}{1}{default}.
TeamEnforcer.RemovedBecauseCTBanned: {blue}{0}{default} was removed because they are CTBanned.
TeamEnforcer.PlayerBanInfoTemp: {blue}{0}{default} was CTBanned on {green}{1}{default} by staff {green}{2}{default} for {green}{3}{default} minutes. Time left: {green}{4}{default} minutes.
TeamEnforcer.KickedFromCT: You were kicked from the CT team, you cannot join for another {green}{0}{default} rounds.
TeamEnforcer.PlayerForceRemovedFromQueue: {blue}{0}{default} was forcefully removed from the queue by {gold}{1}{default}.
TeamEnforcer.AlreadyKicked: {blue}{0}{default} is already kicked from the CT team.
TeamEnforcer.PlayerKickedFromCT: {blue}{0}{default} was kicked from the CT team by {gold}{1}{default}.
